Welcome to SoundCloud Droid 1.0.0.\nPlease use the MENU to access the manual, or to report any problems or feature requests.
Unable to verify connection with SoundCloud.
Select an upload to retry or repeat it.
There are no uploads to display.
SoundCloud might not be able to process 3gpp audio files.\n\nYou can record WAV audio files using Rehearsal Assistant and upload those instead.
Please Connect with SoundCloud before uploading.\n\nYou may retry this upload via "View Upload Status".
